price: 1. Bapagano kati ya baye bazwa buku mpe na basangisi (Allah) bakotika kompengwa te kino elembo ya polele ekoyelaka bango.
arabic: لَمۡ يَكُنِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِنۡ أَهۡلِ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ وَٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ مُنفَكِّينَ حَتَّىٰ تَأۡتِيَهُمُ ٱلۡبَيِّنَةُ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: lam yakuni alladhīna kafarū min ahli al-kitābi wal-mush'rikīna munfakkīna ḥattā tatiyahumu al-bayinatu
